{{stub}} {{scene | name = Arwen's Fate | film = [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]] | image = | number = 29 (theatrical)
38 (extended) | duration = | event = | characters = [[Arwen]], [[Elrond]] | previous = [[The Grace of the Valar]] | next = [[The Story Foreseen from Lórien]] }} '''Arwen's Fate''' is the twenty-ninth scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'' and the thirty-eighth scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers'' (extended edition)]]. ==Differences== Much of the dialogue spoken by [[Elrond]] in this scene is adapted from the final parts of [[The Tale of Aragorn and Arwen]] in [[The Lord of the Rings Appendices|the Appendices]], where it is told that [[Aragorn]] died, and that [[Arwen]] went to [[Lórien]] alone following his death.{{App|Tale}}, pp. 1062-3 {{references}} [[Category:The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers scenes|38]]
